feed.title: Willow Creek (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Willow Creek (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Claresholm 8:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: WSW 56 km/h gust 76 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in wind prone areas this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
